description: Removes the association of tags from an Amazon DynamoDB resource. You can call UntagResource up to five times per second, per account. For an overview on tagging DynamoDB resources, see Tagging for DynamoDB in the Amazon DynamoDB Developer Guide.

parameters.name: ResourceArn
parameters.description: The DynamoDB resource that the tags will be removed from. This value is an Amazon Resource Name (ARN).

parameters.name: TagKeys
parameters.description: A list of tag keys. Existing tags of the resource whose keys are members of this list will be removed from the DynamoDB resource. (string) ---
